title: Train service delay due to sleeper replacement work

title_translations.zh-Hans: 因更换枕木工程导致列车服务延误
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api tertunda kerana kerja penggantian rel
title_translations.ta: தூக்க மாற்றுப் பணிகளால் ரயில் சேவை தாமதம்

updates.text: [Cleared] train service between Tanah Merah & Paris Ris & Kembangan to Bugis has resumed.
[EWL]Due to sleeper replacement work, train service between TanahMerah & PasirRis and TanahMerah & ChangiAirport will be delayed for 30mins.
